#############
``mapdeduce``
#############

Testing associations between genetic and antigenic changes and handling sequence and antigenic map data.

************
Installation
************

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/acorg/mapdeduce.git
   cd mapdeduce
   pip install .

*********

*********

   :maxdepth: 3

   mapseq
   orderedmapseq
